menu.title: Menu 'Fitness'
menu.descr: Menu 'Fitness' is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. For people who are interested in sports. It is a completely new product with optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Menu 'Vegan'
menu.descr: Our special 'Vegan' Menu is a careful selection of ingredients: total absence of animal products. Complete harmony with yourself and nature in every element!

menu.title: Menu 'Premium'
menu.descr: Menu 'Premium' - we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
